statements: SELECT * FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs;
SELECT id, name, price FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs;
SELECT * FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs WHERE price > 100;
SELECT name, manufacturer FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, manufacturer FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT * FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs WHERE price < 50;
SELECT manufacturer, price FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs WHERE name LIKE 'Aspirin%';
SELECT id, name, price FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT manufacturer, price FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs WHERE price > 50 AND price < 150;
SELECT * FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs WHERE manufacturer IN ('Johnson & Johnson', 'Merck');
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_drugs FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_drugs FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs;
SELECT * FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs WHERE expiration_date = (SELECT MAX(expiration_date) FROM Pharmaceutical_Drugs);
SELECT * FROM Drugs WHERE drug_id = 1
SELECT name, manufacturer FROM Drugs WHERE dosage > 50
SELECT * FROM Drugs WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer'
SELECT * FROM Drugs WHERE name LIKE '%cetamol%'
SELECT * FROM Drugs WHERE dosage BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM Drugs ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM Drugs ORDER BY dosage DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Drugs
SELECT MAX(dosage) FROM Drugs
SELECT AVG(dosage) FROM Drugs
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 60
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Patients
SELECT MAX(age) FROM Patients
SELECT AVG(age) FROM Patients
SELECT * FROM Drugs D INNER JOIN Patients P ON D.drug_id = P.patient_id
SELECT * FROM Drugs
SELECT id, name, price FROM Drugs
SELECT name, price FROM Drugs WHERE price > 50
SELECT * FROM Manufacturers
SELECT id, name, location FROM Manufacturers
SELECT name, location FROM Manufacturers WHERE location = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM Sales
SELECT id, quantity, sale_date FROM Sales
SELECT * FROM Drugs JOIN Sales ON Drugs.id = Sales.drug_id
SELECT * FROM Manufacturers JOIN Sales ON Manufacturers.id = Sales.manufacturer_id
SELECT Drugs.name, Sales.quantity, Sales.sale_date FROM Drugs JOIN Sales ON Drugs.id = Sales.drug_id
SELECT Manufacturers.name, Sales.quantity, Sales.sale_date FROM Manufacturers JOIN Sales ON Manufacturers.id = Sales.manufacturer_id
SELECT Drugs.name, Manufacturers.name, Sales.quantity, Sales.sale_date FROM Drugs JOIN Sales ON Drugs.id = Sales.drug_id JOIN Manufacturers ON Manufacturers.id = Sales.manufacturer_id

SELECT Drugs.name, Manufacturers.name, Sales.quantity, Sales.sale_date FROM Drugs JOIN Sales ON Drugs.id = Sales.drug_id JOIN Manufacturers ON Manufacturers.id = Sales.manufacturer_id WHERE Sales.quantity > 100
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Drugs
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Manufacturers
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Sales
SELECT SUM(quantity) FROM Sales
SELECT AVG(price) FROM Drugs
SELECT * FROM pharmacy;
SELECT id, name FROM pharmacy;
SELECT location FROM pharmacy WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, location FROM pharmacy WHERE name = 'ABC Pharmacy';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pharmacy;
SELECT * FROM pharmacy WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM pharmacy WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM pharmacy ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT AVG(id) FROM pharmacy;
SELECT MAX(id) FROM pharmacy;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM pharmacy;
SELECT name, COUNT(*) FROM pharmacy GROUP BY name;
SELECT id, location FROM pharmacy WHERE name LIKE '%Pharmacy%';
SELECT * FROM pharmacy LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM pharmacy WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, name, location FROM pharmacy WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'Chicago';
SELECT SUM(id) FROM pharmacy;
SELECT MIN(id), MAX(id) FROM pharmacy;
SELECT * FROM pharmacy WHERE location = 'Los Angeles' OR location = 'San Francisco';
SELECT id, name FROM pharmacy WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Boston');
SELECT * FROM manufacturers;
SELECT * FROM drugs;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM pharmacies;
SELECT name FROM manufacturers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT name, dosage FROM drugs WHERE manufacturer_id='xyz';
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE age >= 50;
SELECT * FROM pharmacies WHERE location='Los Angeles';
SELECT manufacturer_id, name FROM manufacturers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT drug_id, name FROM drugs ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE address IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM pharmacies WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';

SELECT AVG(quantity) FROM prescriptions;
SELECT name, MAX(age) FROM patients;
SELECT manufacturer_id, COUNT(*) FROM drugs GROUP BY manufacturer_id;
SELECT MAX(date_prescribed) FROM prescriptions;
